sub_title: Business Delivery Lead in The Netherlands at Orange Cyberdefense
summary: Experienced leader bringing over 25 years of experience in establishing operational implementations and optimizations across diverse industries in both national and international operations. Recognized for my strong service oriented drive, delivery focussed, high commitment, service improvements, focus on cost, technical driven and as a people manager who cares for my team and customers. Customer-centric thinking is what I strongly believe in. Everything we do must have a customer component in it.

school.name: EDS OPD Internal IT Training program 2 years incl. Basic Leadership, Advanced Leadership training

profile_positions.description: Business Delivery Lead of one of Orange Cyberdefense's Strategic Accounts.
profile_positions.title: Business Delivery Lead

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for a team of more than 30 fte’s (IT Consultants, Project Managers, Architects and Maintenance staff with Operations Manager reporting to me) delivering Managed Hosting Services. Main focus of this team is ensuring our 2 active-active datacenters are available 100% of the time for our customers. Managed budget approximately Euro 13 million.

Responsible for the availability of more than 80+ customers running their applications in our twin datacenter environment, covering more than 55% of first line GP's (huisartsen) and pharmacies in NL, 10+ Mental Institutions (GGZ), laboratories, CARE institutions, more than 10 million medical files and over 150 Dutch municipalities are hosted in our datacenters.
profile_positions.title: Unit Manager Infrastructure Services

profile_positions.description:
Interim Manager Datacenter Services and Workplace Services at PharmaPartners, located at client location acting as an integral part of PharmaPartners Management team.
Responsible for "keeping the lights on" during an outsourcing project and datacenter migration that occurred simultaneously.
Outsourcing of existing Datacenter and Workplace Services team, to PinkRoccade Healthcare Hosting Services. Keeping the critical staff onboard and ensuring a smooth datacenter migration project from current PharmaPartners datacenter to PinkRoccade Healthcare datacenters was key to the success of this assignment.
profile_positions.title: Interim Manager at PharmaPartners

profile_positions.description:
End to end responsible for all Run-Operational Services delivered by Hewlett Packard (HP) to JDE globally (formally known as Sara Lee). Scope contains WPS (Workplace Services, including Global Service Desk in Manila, Philippines), SAP support out of Sao Paulo, Brazil and Datacenter services delivered out of Sofia, Bulgaria. Managed budget approximately Euro 15 million.

Started with 18 countries with DEMB presence and ended with a scope of 39 countries with JDE/DEMB presence and this was covered globally by 3 full-time ADM’s (Bulgaria, Hungary and NL) and 2 part-time ADM’s (Brazil and Australia) reporting to me.

Next to the ADM’s, managed a team of 10 fte’s in NL directly, as line manager, but a functional reporting line of 160 fte’s worldwide delivering leveraged services globally.
profile_positions.title: Account Delivery Executive

profile_positions.description:
Program Director HP for Saudi Hollandi Bank in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Worked with external partners and one system integrator to establish a true Multi-Channel Platform for the Retail part of the bank. (Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, IVR, ATM, etc.)

End to end responsible for this program that drastically reshaped IT systems for the bank’s payment channels. This was an 18 month program.

Responsible for managing multi-vendor team (5 external suppliers) out of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. 2 PM’s were reporting to me during this program.
profile_positions.title: Program Director

profile_positions.description:
Account/Service Delivery Manager for Supply Chain Systems(Distribution Centres Albert Heijn) & Replenishment systems, core IT Albert Heijn. Acted as first deputy for the Account Delivery Executive HP, responsible for the global contract of EDS/HP with Ahold. 

Services delivered out of several bestshore locations in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and Bangalore, India.
profile_positions.title: Service Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description: Service Delivery Manager for Ahold Holding (board, executives and staff functions). Responsible for services delivered to Board of Directors in Amsterdam, including VIP support, application support of Finance and HR systems.
profile_positions.title: Service Delivery Manager Ahold Holding

profile_positions.description:
Managed the implementation of ISAP (International Standard Application Platform) back office systems in Mexico City.

End responsible as PM for the implementation of ISAP/SCORE, conversion from the current 5 source systems used by ABN AMRO Mexico branch to ISAP platform, interfaces to both ISAP satellites as well as external vendor satellites (payment system Top Systems/Treasury TAS), training of local staff and embedding in the branch’ organization.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EDS ABN AMRO Wholesale Account

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating Setup of Global Support for MLD(Money Laundering Detection) application.

Support for the MLD Program needed to be set up. ABN AMRO bought a specific application suite for this. This solution was implemented globally by EDS Implementation team, divided in EMEA, APAC and LATAM. Support needed to be uplifted to a global level. This was my primary responsibility in this role. Together with a process writer and IT Operations single point of contact, we took care of writing down procedures, work instructions for all supporting groups and bring systems into FMO by following the TOP (Turn Over to Production) process within IT Operations.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EDS ABN AMRO Wholesale Account

profile_positions.description: End responsible for all local changes in ABN AMRO Turkey and all ISAP global changes related to Turkish Lira redenomination per 1/1/2005. I was responsible for a team of 6 persons, covering all aspects of the impact on both General Ledger systems and other financial systems used by ABN AMRO Turkey to ensure business continuity after 1/1/2005.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EDS ABN AMRO Wholesale Account

profile_positions.description:
Implementation consultant / Project coordinator for Integration New Growth Markets Turkey/Russia for ABN AMRO Wholesale.

Integration software 3rd party (Payment Channel) within existing banking middleware and back offices and coordination of  implementation consultants, creation of schedules, communicating towards vendor, release-planning with vendor, single point of contact for ABN AMRO WCS IT and Business, responsible for the complete implementation, setup of  SLA’s, hosting agreements with IT Operations, etc.

The endresult was an Internet Banking channel for Wholesale customers in Turkey and Russia.
profile_positions.title: Implementation Consultant/Project Manager EDS ABN AMRO Wholesale Account

profile_positions.description: Maintenance of Infrastructure GIS (production environment, implementation of new releases of GIS software (including creation of Runbooks, release documentation, technical implementation runbooks, technical documentation, manuals, etc.), maintenance of GIS software itself (corrective/adaptive), release policy, version control, maintenance and control of source code, acceptance of source code/releases for production and admittance into SLA, single point of contact for the customer with regard to systems in production, execution of the SLA, education & test environments for both EDS as customer based.
profile_positions.title: EDS Service Delivery Manager for Nuon (Utility company)
